name: slalom
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a race for people on skis, or in canoes or kayaks (= light, narrow boats), in which they have to follow a route that bends in and out between poles: Alpine skiing consists of the downhill and slaloms. Competitors will participate in a river slalom race.
Mike Powell/Stone/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesHe skied well enough to take third place in the slalom.In slalom the poles are close together, whereas in giant slalom the gates are further apart.A conveyer prepared to launch a kayak into the slalom course.
